message:
Dear {{ doc.owner }},

We are pleased to inform you that an interview has been scheduled for the job opening of {{ doc.job_opening }} at {{ doc.company }} for the position of {{ doc.for_designation }}.

Interview Details:

  • Date: {{ doc.date }}
  • From Time: {{ doc.from_time }}
  • To Time: {{ doc.to_time }}

For further details, please review the Interview Availability Form and take the necessary actions as required.

If you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Job Applicant Assigning Notification
subject: Job Applicant Assigning Notification
